channel.title: Help please -- NPC Dont drop items when ranged
channel.description:
1) when i range npc with a bow and arrows they dont drop items like when i do with a sword does anyone know what i have to change for it to work.
plus if you can
2) magic dosnt kill npc as well does anyone know what i have to add and where.
Any help would be greatfully received thanks a lot for reading //James
